query:
SELECT
            cp.id,
            c.front,
            c.back,
            c.media_url
        FROM card_progress cp
        JOIN cards c ON c.id = cp.card_id
        WHERE cp.user_id = $1
            AND (cp.due_date <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR cp.review_count = 0)
        ORDER BY cp.due_date ASC
